title: Decorative bold serif font from William Sonoma
author: mjhalo

comments.content: It looks like an old version of **[Engravers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307112141/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Engravers%20MT%20-%20Bold&fid=41537426ab1d2daaace698640ce7c1a8&fstyle=i&fsize=48&text=TART%20CHERRY%20SALTED%20MALT%20BALL&wrap=2)** + the outline and slant
